[Page Title: HOME | Athens Restaurant]

top of page Welcome to Athens Restaurant ​ ​ ​ Kali Orexi ~ Enjoy Your Meal ​ ​ Owners, George Koutsogiannakis Vasilios Koutsogiannakis We have crafted our Greek family recipes to share with those looking for an authentic dining experience. It has been our pleasure to serve our community for the past 40 years, and we look forward to serving your next meal. Screen Shot 2021-09-10 at 5.06_edited.jpg Follow Us on Social Media bottom of page

[Page Title: Our Menu | Athens Restaurant]

top of page Our Menu Appetizers Soups & Salads Greek Sandwiches Our Famous Greek Pizzas Traditional Dishes Pasta Entrees Wine Beer Dessert Our Menu Appetizers Hummus Our traditional hummus incorporates a zesty blend of garbanzo beans, garlic, olive oil, sesame tahini, and savory spices. 
Served with pita bread wedges $9.95 Dolmades ~ Stuffed Grape Leaves Marinated Ground Beef and Rice, rolled in Grape Leaves, and topped off with Light Lemon White Sauce $9.95 Spanakopitakia This pie comes prepared with a blend of feta cheese and spinach. Sautéed with onions and herbs, and then baked in flaky layers of phyllo dough $10.95 Mezes Platter Choice cuts of Marinated Pork, Gyro, Feta Cheese, Greek Peppers, Greek Olives, Pita Bread, Tomatoes, and Tzatziki Sauce $14.95 Soups & Salads Greek Soup Bowl A zesty broth blended with egg, lemon, chicken, and rice $6.95 House Salad Fresh mixed greens served with Roma tomatoes, Greek olives, and feta cheese $5.25 Greek Salad Fresh mixed greens, Roma tomatoes, Greek olives, and Feta cheese $14.95 Grilled Chicken Salad Marinated chicken strips, Roma tomatoes, Greek olives, and Feta cheese served over fresh mixed greens $17.95 Gyro Salad Fresh mixed greens served with gyro meat, Roma tomatoes, Greek olives, and Feta cheese $17.95 Village Salad Classic Greek salad of Roma tomato, cucumber, Bell pepper
Red onions, oregano, Calamata olives and feta cheese $17.95 Greek Sandwiches Gyro Pita Platter A Grecian delight of gyro meat with tzatziki sauce, onions, tomatoes rolled in grilled pita bread, served with hand cut, fried Greek potatoes. $17.95 Beef Meatball Pita Platter Greek style Beef meatballs with tzatziki sauce, onions, Roma tomatoes, rolled in grilled pita bread, served with hand cut fried Greek potatoes. $17.95 Chicken Pita Platter Grilled chicken tenders served with tzatziki sauce, onions, tomatoes rolled in grilled pita bread served with hand cut, Fried Greek potatoes $16.95 Gyro Pita A Grecian delight of gyro meat served with tzatziki sauce, onions, and tomatoes. Rolled in pita bread $12.95 Beef Meatball Pita Greek style Beef meatballs with tzatziki sauce, onions,
Roma tomatoes, rolled in grilled pita bread. $12.95 Chicken Pita Grilled chicken tenders served with tzatziki sauce, onions, and tomatoes. Rolled in pita bread $11.95 Our Famous Greek Pizza Cheese Pizza 12" Cheese Pizza (8 slices) $15.95 Make Your Own Make your own 12" Pizza. Add your own ingredients, $2.00 per topping from a selection of 
Extra Cheese • Feta Cheese • Pepperoni • Meatball • 
Chicken • Sausage • Gyro • Bell Pepper • Tomatoes • Olives 
• Canadian Bacon • Mushrooms • Eggplant • Onion $15.95 Toppings Extra Toppings $2.00 each:
Extra Cheese • Feta Cheese • Pepperoni • Meatball • Chicken • Sausage • Gyro • Bell Pepper • Tomatoes • Olives • Canadian Bacon • Mushrooms • Eggplant • Onion $2 Traditional Dishes Chicken (Koto'poulo) Half a natural chicken marinated in spices, served with our oven roasted potatoes. $19.95 Chicken (Kabob) Skewered marinated cuts of chicken breast, peppers, onions, Roma tomatoes and Greek spices char-grilled to perfection. served with our oven roasted potatoes. $19.95 Spanakopita A pungently aromatic pie made of feta cheese and spinach, onions, and herbs. Baked in flaky leave of fillo pastry $17.95 Moussaka Baked layers of eggplant, potatoes, marinated choice ground beef blended with aromatic herbs and spices all topped with a béchamel sauce $22.95 Norwegian Salmon Fresh Salmon broiled with lemon juice, Greek spices & olive oil. Topped with our homemade lemon fish Sause & served,
With steamed broccoli. $26.95 Pasta Entrees Spaghetti with Meat Sauce Spaghetti is served with your choice of house prepared tomato sauce, or our finely chopped ground beef sauce blended with onions and garlic $15.95 Lasagna Baked layers of pasta in our own meat sauce and Greek spices baked with ricotta, mozzarella, and parmesan cheese. $19.95 Spaghetti with Meatballs Made with chopped choice ground beef blended with onions, garlic, and fresh Greek spices mixed with our tomato sauce $17.95 Veal Parmigiana Tender breaded veal cutlets baked in our own special meat sauce and cheeses served with spaghetti. $18.95 Desserts Baklava Traditional Greek dessert prepared with honey, nuts, and phyllo dough. Topped with our honey syrup $7.95 Galaktoboureko Honey dipped phyllo dough filled with a creamy custard and toped with honey syrup $8.95 Anchor 1- App lunch-anch2 lunch-platters lunch-sandwiches Lunch-Pizzas lunch-entrees lunch-desserts lunch-traditional dishes lunch- pasta entrees bottom of page

[Page Title: Location & Hours | Athens Restaurant]

top of page ​ Athens Restaurant 1739 Maybank Highway Charleston , SC 29412 ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ Hours of Operation Monday: closed Tuesday to Sunday: 11:00 am - 9:00 pm ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ bottom of page
